name: Id Insinuation IV
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text:
This spell functions as id insinuation I, except as noted above.

In addition, on the first round of the effect, you can select the result of each creature's confused condition without having to roll, but this doesn't allow you to make any decisions about how that result is applied. On the following rounds of the effect, the targets of this spell must roll twice to determine their confused effect. You select which roll is used. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同本我暗示 I（ID Insinuation I）一般，差异如上所述。此外，在该效果的第一轮，你能够无需检定，直接选择每个生物的困惑状态（confused condition）的结果，不过这么做并不能允许你指定目标的结果如何发生。在该效果的后续回合内，法术的目标必须投掷两次来判断困惑状态的结果。由你选择使用哪个检定结果。该法术可以被降阶施法。
